name: Lightmin
short_description:
Web-based GUI for end-user system management in an unmanaged server environment, such as Cloud/VPS.

Lightmin's goal is to provide an intuitively seamless, non-imposing web-based administration platform for systems such as domain hosting servers. Lightmin provides advantages over other solutions such as cPanel and Webmin, including a smaller but scalable footprint, easily portable and extendable, and best of all, non-invasive. Lightmin simply adds a transparent layer to your underlying system configuration providing users with a productive (and pretty) side-by-side alternative to remoting tools such as SSH and RDP.

Plug-in architecture provides customizability and scalability.
